scripts.prepare: trap 'kill 0' SIGINT; (cd service; bun run prepare) & (cd web; bun run prepare) & (cd share; bun run prepare) & bun run prepare:self & wait
scripts.:dev: trap 'kill 0' EXIT; (cd web; bun run dev) & (cd service; bun run dev) & wait
scripts.check: (cd web && bun check) && (cd service && bun check) && (cd share && bun run check)
scripts.local-db: cd service; rm ../local.db; DATABASE_URL=file:../local.db bun db push --force
